FuncDef:
The mpls te reoptimization command starts re-optimization for an MPLS TE tunnel.
By default, the Manual re-optimization is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a split tunnel.
The name is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Auto tunnel name.
The name is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the mpls te reoptimization command is run in the user view, all TE tunnels will be re-optimized immediately.
